data.eml:eml: Museo Nacional de Ciencias Naturales, Colección de Aves: MNCN-Ornit

The Bird Collection of the Spanish Museo Nacional de Ciencias Naturales holds around 30.000 specimens. The data currently not available on GBIF can be obtained from the persons in charge of the collection and database.

Note: this dataset was previously orphaned. It has been rescued by ① extracting it from the GBIF.org index (see GBIF Download in External Data) and ② republishing it on this IPT data hosting centre as version 1.0.
